name: Pipey86
tagline: A Pipeline Simulator of Y86 Instruction Set
body:
PipeY86
=======
Just A Pipeline Simulator of Y86 Instruction Set

## To compile it, you need:

* Qt 5.2 with QML
* QGrahpicalEffects

Qt Offical downloads can solve all things about Qt

* CMake version >= 2.8.0

## Compile
mkdir build

cd build

cmake ../

make

## Run
cd build

./pipey96

## Other tools
s2o is a simple y86 assembler.

pipecmd is a simple commandline version of y86 simulator.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
